Function reference

All functions

format_params()
Format a list of parameters
is_paginated()
Detect whether a request is paginated
mm_bind_then_tbl()
Bind multiple Megamation API pages by row before converting to a tibble
mm_error_body()
Extract error body from a Megamation API response
mm_get()
Get data
mm_get_names()
Get column names and which are currently filters
mm_req()
Create a Megamation API request
mm_req_append()
Append a GET request
mm_req_paginate()
Add pagination to a Megamation API request
mm_req_paginate_custom()
Add pagination to a Megamation API request
mm_req_params()
Modify request URL with filtering components
mm_req_perform()
Perform a Megamation API request
mm_req_perform_paginate_custom()
Perform a paginated request
mm_resp_extract()
Extract data from Megamation API response
mm_resp_parse()
Parse body from Megamation API response
mm_set_creds()
Install Megamation credentials in your .Renviron file for repeated use
parsed_extract() extract_data() extract_criteria() extract_schema()
Create tibble from parsed response
remove_api_urls()
Remove API _links column in data
req_opts()
Specify request options
